Detailed Description

Base class: wrapper and parser for external scoring functions.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ExternalScoringFunction::ExternalScoringFunction ( std::string  cmdline  ) 

Constructor.

Parameters:
cmdline Command line to run the chosen external protein-ligand scoring function with the variables $PROTEIN and $LIGAND denoting where to stuff the values for the proteins and ligands to score.

std::string  lig_path 
) [protected]

Run the chosen external scoring method.

Run the chosen external scoring method

Parameters:
prot_path String holding the path of the protein PDB file
lig_path String holding the path of the ligand mol2 file
Returns:
True if prot_path and lig_path exist and are not directories, otherwise false

virtual bool ASCbase::ExternalScoringFunction::score ( std::string  prot_path,
std::string  lig_path,
std::vector< my_float_t > *  scores 
) [pure virtual]

Score protein-ligand pair using chosen external scoring method.

Score using chosen external scoring method -- force derived classes to override with their version.

Parameters:
prot_path String holding the path of the protein PDB file
lig_path String holding the path of the ligand mol2 file
scores Pointer to vector holding the scores of the pair
Returns:
True if prot_path and lig_path exist and are not directories, otherwise false

Implemented in ASCbase::DrugScoreInterface, and ASCbase::SFCscoreInterface.

virtual void ASCbase::ExternalScoringFunction::sf_names ( std::vector< std::string > *  names  )  [pure virtual]

Get the name(s) of the external scoring function(s) used.

To be overloaded by the derived classes

Parameters:
names Pointer to vector of strings holding the names of the scoring function(s) in the same order as the scores stored in the ext_scores vector in rigid_align_t

Implemented in ASCbase::DrugScoreInterface, and ASCbase::SFCscoreInterface.
